Watson Partner Program

Watch the video

Watson changes everything.

Watson changes everything. How we create technology. How we use technology. And how we use data to uncover valuable insights about it. Watson is part of this transformational shift in technology–a shift from programmatic to cognitive computing. And now, developers are perfectly poised to use Watson APIs to disrupt markets, engage customers and deliver high-value insights and additional revenue to enterprises.

The Watson Mobile Developer Challenge

What would you do with Watson?

Have a great idea for a Watson-powered mobile app? The Watson team wants to hear from you. Submit your proposal before April 14, 2014 for your chance to work with IBM’s Watson engineers.

Learn More

IBM Watson Ecosystem Program

Be part of the Watson Ecosystem

The Watson Ecosystem brings ideas, talent, and content together to create next-generation cognitive apps. Think you have something to contribute? Apply to join us as an Application Partner, a Content Partner or a Talent Partner.
